hypothesis_content.title: Liquidity Gatekeeper Exodus - BTC Spot Premium Collapse
hypothesis_content.statement: Following news of 5 major crypto gatekeepers tightening liquidity chokepoints, BTC spot price on major CEXs will decouple from perpetual futures funding rates within 48 hours, creating a spot premium >1.5% that mean-reverts within 5 trading days as arbitrage capital exits.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Liquidity provider exits create fragmented markets where arbitrage fails due to capital constraints. Spot premiums emerge but cannot sustain without market-making capital.
entry_conditions: BTC spot price on Binance/Kraken >1.5% premium vs Coinbase Pro (volume-weighted)
Perpetual funding rate turns negative while spot premium persists >6 hours
Aggregated CEX order book depth (top 5 levels) drops >30% from 7-day average

exit_conditions.take_profit: Spot premium collapses to <0.3% or inverts to discount
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Premium expands >3% with positive funding resumption

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Spot premium persists >1% for >5 days while funding remains negative, indicating structural change rather than temporary dislocation.
